biotools.summary: Web tool that enables batch search and retrieval of microarray datasets matching user specified criteria from the data in GEO and ArrayExpress microarray repositories. Such batch download facilitates gene expression meta-analysis.

bioschemas.name: Microarray Retriever
bioschemas.summary: Web tool that enables batch search and retrieval of microarray datasets matching user specified criteria from the data in GEO and ArrayExpress microarray repositories. Such batch download facilitates gene expression meta-analysis.
